keyPolicies.policyTitle: Sheffield’s schools, colleges, hospitals, railways and buses
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Properly funded and run for public good, not private profit.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Oppose privatisation of NHS, schools and council services
University education for life, not just exam factories

issues.education: University education for life, not just exam factories; Oppose tuition fees.
issues.transport: Properly fund and run railways and buses for public benefit, not private profit.

community.content: Sheffield’s schools, colleges, hospitals, railways and buses should be properly funded and run for public good not private profit.

quotes.text: This general election isn’t just about Brexit - this is about the country we live in. Only a Green vote will prevent climate chaos, transform Britain whilst remaining in the EU, and elect more Green MPs that will trust to keep the other parties honest. The time is now - please vote Green. Vote Natalie Thomas

examples: Sheffield’s schools, colleges, hospitals, railways and buses should be properly funded and run for public good not private profit.

Only a Green vote will prevent climate chaos, transform Britain whilst remaining in the EU, and elect more Green MPs that will trust to keep the other parties honest.
Sheffield’s schools, colleges, hospitals, railways and buses should be properly funded and run for public good not private profit.

Only a Green vote will prevent climate chaos, transform Britain whilst remaining in the EU, and elect more Green MPs that will trust to keep the other parties honest. The time is now - please vote Green. Vote Natalie Thomas
Greens oppose privatisation of NHS, schools and council services like the Sheffield Highways PFI deal Labour and the Lib Dems negotiated.
University education for life, not just exam factories; Oppose tuition fees brought by Labour, increased by the Lib Dems & Tories.
